instructions: Mix sugar, cornstarch, and salt in a sauce pan. Slowly mix in 5 cups of water over over medium heat. Stirring constantly until the mixture is thickened about 5-10 minutes. Remove from heat

Mix 1 cup of sugar mixture with the eggs quickly to avoid curdling. Pour egg mixture in the sauce pan with remaining sugar mixture over low-medium heat until thickened to pudding consistency, whisk in butter and lemon juice
Polaroid iPhone bitters chambray. Cornhole swag kombucha live-edge.
Pour into ramekin bowls to cool.
